recipe.title: Peas with Pancetta
ingredients: 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh Italian parsley
instructions: Heat 2 tablespoons olive oil in heavy large skillet over medium-low heat. Add onion and pancetta and sauté until onion is tender, about 5 minutes. Add peas, parsley and beef broth; stir until peas are heated through, about 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
